channel.title: My 525 Server Got Problems
channel.description: Hi Mopar Users :p Im working on my 525 server of a source but my "compiler" wont work it says something like i dont have java or javac file not found or something like that so i tried to edit in the "bin" with a class editor and i found the text in the chat but i cant edit the text as i can in 317's then it get error when people join - How can i edit it without destroying the server and how can i might fix the "compiler" but most of all i wanna know how i can fix the welcome message to mine with the actionsender.class with a class ediotr without fucking up the server [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnmute.gif[/img] [/center]

item.title: My 525 Server Got Problems
item.dc:creator: @Demiron Demiron
item.description:
@Demiron wrote:

Hi Mopar Users
Im working on my 525 server of a source but my “compiler” wont work it says something like i dont have java or javac file not found or something like that
so i tried to edit in the “bin” with a class editor and i found the text in the chat but i cant edit the text as i can in 317’s then it get error when people join - How can i edit it without destroying the server and how can i might fix the “compiler” but most of all i wanna know how i can fix the welcome message to mine with the actionsender.class with a class ediotr without fucking up the server
[center] [/center]

Read full topic
